data.host: ECU IP address (follow connection method table in readme)
data.scan_interval: ECU query interval in seconds (minimum 300 recommended)
data.CACHE: Retries when ECU fails (range between 1 - 5 recommended)
data.SSID: Specify SSID (For ECU-R (sunspec) and ECU-C models only)
data.WPA-PSK: Specify password (For ECU-R (sunspec) and ECU-C models only)

error.cannot_connect: Can't find ECU at this IP-Address or life-time energy is zero
error.no_ecuid: No ECU ID returned from ECU
error.unknown: Unknown error, see log for details
